entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS AROUND 50

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
